pageContext.claim: “A low level staffer that I hardly knew named Cliff Sims wrote yet another boring book based on made up stories and fiction. He pretended to be an insider when in fact he was nothing more than a gofer. He signed a non-disclosure agreement. He is a mess!”
pageContext.analysis: Sims was a communications staffer who enjoyed unusual access in the chaotic early months of the Trump White House, writing hundreds of pages of notes about conversations he participated in or overheard.
